comments.body: How it works:Users buy itcoins for either USD or USDT 1:1, Add------>Add itcoin USD wallet balance via the link below:https://www.txbit.io/deposit/USDConvert------>https://www.txbit.io/trade/itcoin/usdUse Tether ------->https://www.txbit.io/trade/itcoin/usdtin exchange Users receive access to:. 3.95% fee rates. 1:1 online liquidity 24/7. 60 second rewardsRemit to other Users, earn rewards or store as a stable stockpile savings-alternative.
